title: Under the Light, yet under
poem:
Under
Under
Under
Under
the
the
the
the
Light, yet under,
Grass and the Dirt,
Beetle's Cellar
Clover's Root,
Further than Arm could stretch
Were it Giant long,
Further than Sunshine could
Were the Day Year long,
Over
Over
Over
Over
the
the
the
the
Light, yet over,
Arc of the Bird-
Comet's chimney-
Cubit's Head,
Further than Guess can gallop
Further than Riddle ride-
Oh for a Disc to the Distance
Between Ourselves and the Dead!
